thread.title: PBA: Ginebra outlasts Star to set up finals date with San Miguel
thread.title_full: PBA: Ginebra outlasts Star to set up finals date with San Miguel

author: ABS-CBN News
title: PBA: Ginebra outlasts Star to set up finals date with San Miguel
text:
PBA: Ginebra outlasts Star to set up finals date with San Miguel ABS-CBN News Posted at Feb 21 2017 09:24 PM | Updated as of Feb 21 2017 09:28 PM 
Share Facebook 
Sol Mercado scored 23 points and Japeth Aguilar added 19 and Barangay Ginebra bookended Game 7 with two decisive runs to beat Star 89-76 at Mall of Asia Arena on Tuesday and advance to the PBA Philippine Cup finals. 
Ginebra will take on San Miguel in a best-of-7 championship series that begins at MoA Arena on Friday. Tip-off is at 7 p.m. 
Ginebra limited Star to 1 field goal in the opening 6 1/2 minutes, before shutting down the Hotshots with a 12-2 run in a 6-minute stretch in the 4th just as they were threatening. 
(more details to come)
